title: Defence training

properties.name: description
properties.value: Defence is a combat skill that applies to all classes. As such, it can be trained by fighting with any of Melee, Ranged, or Magic.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Defence training

Defence is a combat skill that applies to all classes. As such, it can be trained by fighting with any of Melee, Ranged, or Magic.
